properties.description: Blocks assignment of specified RBAC roles on isolated storage resources. Use this policy to prevent overly permissive role assignments (e.g., Contributor, Owner) to storage accounts with private endpoint access.

metadata.description: The list of blocked role definition resource IDs that cannot be assigned (e.g. /providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/<guid>).

Optional list of Microsoft Entra ID objectIds for exempt principals (users and/or groups). If the role assignment principalId is in this list, the assignment is exempt from the blocked role definition list.
The list of target resource group names where the policy will be enforced.
